title: We apologize for the output outage
author: VD
content_html: And yes, I’m quite fine, thanks very much. I merely had to do a little work-related travel which, along with a new book idea, absorbed most of my available synapses.
content_text: And yes, I’m quite fine, thanks very much.  I merely had to do a little work-related travel which, along with a new book idea, absorbed most of my available synapses.
